entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
